reviews.title: Would definitely stay again
reviews.text: Gorgeous rooms, fabulous bathrooms, brilliant service and a fantastic wine list.

reviews.title: Class
reviews.text: I stayed here on repeated visits in 2004 whilst working in leeds and was made to feel very welcome every time i visited.
Only one minor complaint was that they do not seem to give preference to guests when dining but with a wealth of good restaurants nearby, it wasn't a problem.
reviews.title: Everyday brilliance!

reviews.text: My husband & I stayed for a Saturday night, at the basic rate of £89 per room. At this price, I expected to be allocated a small, very basic room, but the room we had was beautifully decorated/presented, large, with a lovely bathroom, and even a relaxing CD playing when we entered the room!
reviews.title: GOOD LOCATION

reviews.text: We stayed at this Malmaison for a friends birthday, we wanted something nice but of a guaranteed standard. The hotel was nice, the rooms were reasonably large and of a standard decoration level. However the service that came with them was appalling. One room was available when we arrived at 12.30 that were nice. The second room was not available at 4.10 when we asked and then the Duty manager then started to have an argument with me in the lobby.
reviews.title: Hotel fine, absolutely awful service

reviews.text: I asked him if he thought that a room not being ready at 4.10pm was acceptable and he said they don't guarantee a room at 3pm they only aim to do so!! For £135 a night I told him I suggest he find me one and fast! As it turns out it was ready just the lack of communication in the hotel meant that noone knew or thought to tell us!!
reviews.title: Decent hotel
